isis.stitle: CAB: 4100, 4200, 4300 AND 4400 MODELS - INSTALL - Extended Cab Rear Side Window

svcsubproc.title: Install Rear Side Window Latch onto Rear Side Window on Extended Cab for all Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 105 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: If removed, install rear side window latch (Item 2) onto rear side window (Item 1) as follows.
With the rear side window (Item 1) laying on a padded work surface latch side up.

Position latch bar (Item 4) of rear side window latch (Item 2) into latch mounting pedestal slot (Item 5) of latch mounting pedestal (Item 3) on the rear side window. Rotate rear side window latch counter clockwise until the latch bar is locked in place.
This procedure is the same to install driver or passenger side rear side window latch on extended cab for all models.

svcsubproc.title: Install Rear Side Window on Extended Cab for all Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 104 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: From outside the cab, install two threaded studs (Item 7) of rear side window (Item 5) into mounting holes in rear side window fence (Item 3).
From inside the cab, install two hex flanged nuts (Item 6) onto threaded studs (Item 7) at the front of window opening for rear side window (Item 5). Tighten to 6.4 to 8 lbf-ft (8.7 to 10.7 N•m).

Position rear side window latch (Item 1) at the mounting holes for the rear side window latch at the rear of the rear side window (Item 5) and install two hex flanged bolts (Item 4). Tighten to 6.4 to 8 lbf-ft (8.7 to 10.7 N•m).

Install passenger side side and corner interior trim panel, refer to SIDE AND CORNER INTERIOR TRIM PANEL
. Install Side and Corner Interior Trim Panel on Extended Cab for all Models.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 200 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Open rear side window latch (Item 1) and install rear side window seal (Item 2) with rear side window seal seam (Item 3) centered at the rear side window latch. Starting at the center of rear side window latch push enter groove (Item 4) of rear side window seal over flange of rear side window fence (Item 5) and outer groove (Item 6) of rear side window seal over the side and corner interior trim panel.

calloutgroup.callout1: 4. ENTER GROOVE OF REAR SIDE WINDOW SEAL
6. OUTER GROOVE OF REAR SIDE WINDOW SEAL

step1.para:
Install passenger side cab door opening scuff plate and seat belt retractor cover, refer to CAB DOOR OPENING SCUFF PLATE AND SEAT BELT RETRACTOR COVER
.
Install passenger bucket seat, fixed passenger seat or fixed passenger bench seat, and if so equipped, full width rear bench seat. Refer to SEATS .
If so equipped, install bunk/storage unit behind front seats, refer to EXTENDED CAB BUNK/STORAGE UNIT .
Repeat procedure to install driver side rear side window on extended cab for all models.
